DOC.brief_summary: Bamberg County resident diagnose high risk diabetes , may eligible clinical research study improve diabetes self-management decrease hospital re-admissions . The purpose study compare effectiveness three hospital discharge follow-up method : 1. standard care , 2. nurse telephone intervention ( care coordination education ) , 3. in-home community health worker intervention ( care coordination education ) .
